🛠️ Effortless Cloudflare Cache Management in Chrome

Transform your cache management experience with Cloudflare Cache Purger, an essential Chrome extension for web professionals. This streamlined tool brings Cloudflare's cache control capabilities directly to your browser, offering instant purging functionality at your fingertips.

💫 Core Features:

- 🎯 Instant cache clearing for individual pages
- 🌐 Complete zone cache purging with one click
- 📊 Real-time operation status updates
- 🔑 Simple and secure credentials management
- 🚀 Performance-focused design

Built for developers, content managers, and site administrators who demand efficient cache control tools. The extension features a clean, intuitive interface that simplifies cache management tasks whether you're working on a single page or managing entire zones.

🛡️ Privacy & Security:

- Local storage of Cloudflare credentials
- Direct Cloudflare API communication
- No data collection or tracking
- Secure credential handling

⚡️ Perfect For:

- Development teams validating website updates
- Digital publishers managing content rollouts
- IT professionals overseeing multiple domains
- Site owners requiring quick cache refreshes

🔧 Simple Configuration:

Just add your Zone ID and API Token to get started. Clear guidance provided for retrieving your Cloudflare credentials, ensuring a smooth setup process.
Created by Korben, this extension combines powerful functionality with thoughtful design, making cache management both efficient and accessible. Released under the MIT License, it provides a reliable solution for professional cache management needs.

✨ Optimize your workflow today with Cloudflare Cache Purger - where powerful cache management meets elegant simplicity in Chrome.
